This app demonstrates:

1. All possible sidebar parameters:
   - `id`: For reactive tracking of sidebar state
   - `title`: Shows a header
   - `position`: Left-side placement
   - `open`: Initial state configuration
   - `width`: Custom width
   - `bg`: Background color
   - `fg`: Text color
   - `class_`: Custom CSS class
   - `max_height_mobile`: Mobile height control
   - `padding`: Internal spacing
   - `gap`: Spacing between elements

2. Functionality includes:
   - Interactive data filtering
   - Responsive visualization
   - Statistics display
   - Sidebar state toggling
   - Multiple input types
   - Reactive calculations

3. Technical features:
   - Uses express mode syntax
   - Demonstrates reactive programming
   - Shows layout management
   - Includes data visualization
   - Implements responsive design

To run this app:

1. Required packages:
```
pip install shiny pandas numpy matplotlib
```

2. Save the code to a file (e.g., `app.py`)

3. Run with:
```
shiny run app.py
```

The app provides a complete demonstration of sidebar capabilities while maintaining good UI/UX practices and proper reactive programming patterns.
